sin.output: sine wave float number streams, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0

saw.output: sawtooth wave float number streams, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0

squ.output: square wave float number streams, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0

tri.output: triangle wave float number streams, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0

mul.description: multiply a number to the input signal and send the signal as ouput

add.description: add a number to the input signal and send the signal as ouput
add.example:
o: sin 440.0 >> mul ~mod
~mod: sin 0.1 >> mul 0.3 >> add 0.5

noiz.output: noise float number streams, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0

imp.output: impulse signal lile [1.0, 0.0, 0.0, ...]; the gap between two 1.0 depends on the frequency.

lpf.description:
resonate low pass filter:
cut off the high frequency part based on cutoff_freq

hpf.description:
resonate high pass filter:
cut off the low frequency part based on cutoff_freq

envperc.input: any non-zero value will trigger the envelope. the value will determine the scale of the envelope.

seq.description:
unlimited number of midi notes seperated by spaces.
underscore means rest.
compound note consists of underscrores and midi notes.
one bar will first divided based on spaces.
then each compound note will further be divided equally.
seq.input: only use 'speed' node for 'seq' node input
seq.output:
relative pitch converted by the midi notes (60=>1.0; 72=>2.0; 48=>0.5).
this pitch float will only come once based on the timing in pattern.
the rest of the float stream will be zeroes.

choose.description: choose a number from the provided sequence.

sp.input:
any none zero value will trigger the sample playback.
for eaxample, 1.0 triggers default pitch, 0.5 octave lower.

speed.description: use before the seq to control the seq speed.
speed.output: the speed at the first place of the block; the rest of the block will be zeros

bd.description: synthesized kick drum. only decay is tweakable for simplicity.
bd.input: value larger than 0 will triggers the envelope and determines the amp

sn.description: synthesized snare drum. only decay is tweakable for simplicity.
sn.input: value larger than 0 will triggers the envelope and determines the amp

hh.description: synthesized hi hat. only decay is tweakable for simplicity.
hh.input: value larger than 0 will triggers the envelope and determines the amp

sawsynth.description: a minimal synth based on sawtooth wave.
sawsynth.input: value larger than 0 will triggers the envelope and determines the pitch (1.0: middle C, 2.0 octave higher)
sawsynth.output: the synth signal; range determined by the envelope

squsynth.description: a minimal synth based on square wave.
squsynth.input: value larger than 0 will triggers the envelope and determines the pitch (1.0: middle C, 2.0 octave higher)
squsynth.output: the synth signal; range determined by the envelope

trisynth.description: a minimal synth based on triangle wave.
trisynth.input: value larger than 0 will triggers the envelope and determines the pitch (1.0: middle C, 2.0 octave higher)
trisynth.output: the synth signal; range determined by the envelope

plate.output: wet signal with the reverb effect
